entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
